DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare feasibility effectiveness , mean immediate long-term result , drug elute balloon ( DEB ) versus conventional balloon angioplasty treatment fail dialysis access .
DOC.brief_title: Drug Eluting Balloon Angioplasty Dialysis Access Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: In total 40 patient already diagnose hemodynamically significant stenosis dialysis AVF AVG ( include venous outflow lesion ) , program undergo percutaneous transluminal angioplasty department , sign inform consent randomize either receive DEB ( Paclitaxel elute balloon ) , conventional balloon therapy . The protocol include description patient 's demographic ( age , gender , dialysis access detail , risk factor ) procedural detail , well immediate result long-term follow .
DOC.criteria: Angiographic clinical diagnosis dysfunctional dialysis access due one stenotic lesion . Patients AVF AVG Fistula graft vessel diameter range 3 mm 12 mm Fistula graft vessel diameter < 3 mm > 12 mm History severe allergic reaction contrast medium Intolerance aspirin and/or clopidogrel Systemic coagulopathy hypercoagulation disorder
